Constructor Detail

GuiException

public GuiException(java.lang.String messageTitle,
                    java.lang.String message,
                    int messageType)
Creates a GuiException with the information necessary to create an error message dialog.

Parameters:
messageTitle - the title used in the error message dialogs.
message - the title used in the error message dialogs.
messageType - the message text used in the error message dialogs.
